document.full_text: rival yemeni forces clashed in the capital sanaa on wednesday, killing two people, as the opposition awaited clarification from gulf arab mediators on the timeframe for a proposed transfer of the president's powers.
document.title: yemen forces clash in sanaa, violence kills 5
lines_and_colors: rival yemeni forces clashed in the capital sanaa on wednesday, killing two people, as the opposition awaited clarification from gulf arab mediators on the timeframe for a proposed transfer of the president's powers.
